RelatedSentence: State lawmakers have approved $ 500,000 in State Grant-in-Aid funding for a planned new Island Heritage Gallery exhibit at Hilos Lyman Museum .

A0: the many people , cultures , events and ideas
RelatedSentence: The new , $ 2 million exhibit to be located in a 3,600 square foot area on the Museums second floor , will explore a historical timeline of the many people , cultures , events and ideas that left their mark on Hawai ` i Island and contributed to the rich , diverse mosaic of modern Hawai ` i .

President and Executive Director Barbara Moir says the new Island Heritage Gallery is the final phase of a 15 - year journey to enhance the Museums position as a world - class learning facility and treasured resource for future generations .
